MONOPOLY GO!.releaseNotes:
A new version has made its way to your Boards, Tycoons!
This time, Mr. M focused on squashing bugs and smoothing out your gameplay experience—all to get things ready for the next Sticker collection!
So update now and GO for the Stickers you need while you can to win A-list rewards!

Last War:Survival.releaseNotes:
1. Gift level cap increased to Level 25, with new dynamic emotes and Avatar Frame rewards added.
2. Optimized the interface display of Arena [Battle Record] to more clearly show defense and win/loss information.

Royal Match.releaseNotes:
Are you ready for a spooky new update?

• Get ready for amazing 100 NEW LEVELS! Hit the CLOCK TOWER and watch the GEARS burst onto the board!

• Explore the NEW AREA! Stock up on scares and sweets in the HALLOWEEN SHOP!

New levels are coming in every two weeks! Be sure to update your game to get the latest content!

Clash Royale.releaseNotes:
New update: CLASH-O-WEEN IS BACK!
• NEW EVOLUTIONS:
• Skeleton Army – A General rises to lead the swarm.
• Royal Ghost – Summons Souldiers to fight by his side.
• NEW LUCKY CHESTS: Special Chests packed with seasonal content - Cards, Cosmetics, and Evolution Shards.
• MERGE TACTICS: New Rulers enter the Arena and the roster expands with powerful Troops like Wizard, Witch, Electro Wizard, and more.
• Plus, bug fixes and improvements to keep battles running smoothly

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!
3. New Feature: Mood Status. Set a status to let others know how you're feeling, making social interactions more fun and personal.

Candy Crush Saga.releaseNotes:
We hope you’re having fun playing Candy Crush Saga! 

We update the game every week with sweet new features, exciting levels, and important bug fixes to keep everything running smoothly. 

Don't forget to download the latest version for the best experience!

New to the game? Don’t be shy, join the fun!

Whiteout Survival.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT:Visit the Dark Zone and unlock the Howling Factory! Join Sam, Colton and Harrison as they're transported to a strange nightmare world. Help them escape by collecting points and unlock exclusive decorations to complete the event.

Royal Kingdom.releaseNotes:

Township.releaseNotes:
Get ready for a new update!
New adventures in Township!

Season Adventures
* Gatsby-era fashion and medieval nobility are coming to Township! Decorate your town and win valuable resources in the Gatsby Pass and Knight Pass!

Thrilling new expeditions
* While searching for traces of Vikings, Richard and Rachel end up captured by them and must fight off a mysterious monster!
* Richard, Ellen, and Alicia take part in filming an exciting Thanksgiving TV show!

New card collection
* Collect cards from the Winter Collection to get a unique badge and other prizes!

Also
* Halloween and Black Friday sales
* Travel to Loch Ness and Santa's home in new regatta seasons!
* Enjoy new buildings—a yoga center and a spiral complex!

Clash of Clans.releaseNotes:
Rank Up!
·   Multiplayer split! Join Tournaments and climb new Leagues in Ranked Battles, or duke it out in regular Battles without the risk of losing Trophies.
·   Revenge is back, and it’s sweet! Attack players that raided your Village to get your resources back!
·   Shields have switched up! Introducing Magic Shields that protect resources and Legend Shields that skip upcoming League Days.
·   Other Changes: We’re reworking Spring Traps and removing Town Hall Weapon Levels.

● Flair can now be obtained automatically.
● Increased the number of decks you can build.
● Player level max has been increased.
● Improvements to some features.

Pokémon GO.releaseNotes: Trainers, we hope you’re enjoying your adventure in Pokémon GO! We update the app regularly with new events and features, so make sure to check the in-game News to stay up to date.

Free Fire.releaseNotes:
[Flame Arena] Step into the inferno as the flames close in. The strongest will claim victory.
[New Loadouts] 4 fresh loadouts to mix and match for ultimate team strategy.
[New Character - Nero] Be careful not to enter and get lost in the dream space this dreamsmith creates.
[New Weapon - Winchester] A full-auto marksman rifle with 2-round firing and high mobility, an excellent pick for long‑range combat.
[Social Island in Custom Room] Create your own hangout and invite friends to party together.

Gardenscapes.releaseNotes:
A fall Gardenscapes update!
NEW EVENTS
Legends of Transylvania: find the missing girls and complete a horror quest!
Scourge of the Seas: embark on a real pirate adventure for treasure!

STORYLINE
Find out what Bill Young's parents were secretly working on at their oceanographic station!

Homescapes.releaseNotes:
Get ready for a thrilling Homescapes update!
 
HALLOWEEN: A NIGHT IN THE WOODS
• Help Robbie find his daughter Chloe in the nighttime forest!
• Uncover the mystery of the sinister masked figure!
• Finish the event to earn a unique decoration!
 
THE FRONTIER'S GOLD
• Learn the story of Austin's great-grandmother, the fearless Marshal Goldy!
• Foil the local bandits' plans and be the first to claim the legendary treasures!
• Finish the event to earn a unique decoration!
 
ALSO
• Spooky Pass and Home Pass! Activate the passes to get coins, boosters, and other valuable rewards!
• The Other Half story continues! Who will Katherine choose?

PUBG MOBILE.releaseNotes:
PUBG MOBILE's Spooky Soiree version arrives on September 4! V4.0 introduces tons of ghostly content, as well as new game modes and tons of collaborations! Get ready for the most spooktacular update of the year!

Classic Mode
1. Ghost Gameplay: Unlock shield, boost, flying, and healing abilities, plus you can engage in battles even after you get knocked out!
2. Mortar: A new weapon that deals high explosive damage. Supports both close aiming and ranged target selection, for more tactical versatility.
3. Weapon Adjustments: Stocks and foregrips have been completely revamped for more precise shooting feedback.
Asymmetric Game Mode: Unfail is now available! Experience the intense 1v4 pursuit and escape showdown between the Predator and the Survivors!
Metro Royale: Challenge your friends to a 1v1, check out the new limited seasonal crates, and face a new limited-time boss.
WOW: WOW 1.0 is officially here! Most players now have access to the editor and can win cash rewards!
Performance Update: The Super Smooth graphics option is now available, designed to improve the frame rate, reduce lag, minimize overheating, and lower power consumption!

Fishdom.releaseNotes:
Check out the latest Fishdom update!
PIRATE GOLD AND THE POWER OF THE ELEMENTS!
- Get tons of rewards and the Traveler's Badge by collecting all the cards in the Journey Collection!
- Embark on the Black Mark expedition and solve the mystery of Captain Black's cursed doubloon!
- Take on the challenges in the Thunder Spear expedition and appease Tlaloc and his furious thunderstorms!
ALSO
New aquarium: Treasure Island
New fish: Frontosa Cichlid and Rainbow Darter
Enjoy the game!

Color Block Jam.releaseNotes: New look, same fun! We’ve refreshed our game icon, so you’ll spot us more easily on your home screen. Get ready to take your skills to the next level with our LATEST NEW OBSTACLE! This update introduces the COLORFUL CRATE and FRESH NEW LEVELS! Colorful crates are cleared once all blocks of the same color are removed from the board. Watch carefully which colors you have, plan your moves wisely, and clear your path with perfect timing! Strategy, timing, and precision will decide your success. Don’t miss the new update!

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Descend into uncharted depths with Call of Duty®: Mobile’s Season 7: Phantom Current! Unearth the secrets of the abyss and encounter CODM’s sixth Mythic Operator, Dark Shepherd, a special crossover with Girls’ Frontline, and a refreshed Legendary reward in the Secret Cache system. 

New Mythic Dark Shepherd: 
Unleash darkness with the most sinister Mythic Operator yet, Dark Shepherd – Phantom. Wield the Epic Scythe and Legendary AS-VAL to dominate the lobby with forces from another dimension. With power coursing through your veins, every fight becomes a surge of unstoppable force. 

New Secret Cache Reward: 
Another Legendary weapon skin is landing in the Secret Cache system! Log in and play to start earning the RUS-79U – Mystical Lamp… before it vanishes in a puff of smoke—and no genie can bring it back. 
 
Girls’ Frontline: 
Girls’ Frontline deploys into Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 7! Recruit an iconic T-Doll Operator and gear up with exclusive themed items. Complete the seasonal event to de-stress, reload, and reinforce your squad with free Girls’ Frontline rewards. 

New Battle Passes:  
Season 7 brings an all-new Battle Pass and the opportunity to earn 50 tiers of free and premium rewards, including the new MG 82 weapon and Bomb Drone Scorestreak! Gear up and stay the course—more treasures await you in the Season 8 Battle Pass! 

New Battle Pass Vaults:    
Fan-favorite Battle Passes are setting sail once again in the Vault for Seasons 7 and 8—don’t miss your chance to rearm with gear from past deployments! Season 7 brings Season 11: Ultimate Frontier (2022) and Season 7: Heat Wave (2023) back on deck. Hold steady—more cargo is charted for arrival in Season 8! 

Major Gameplay Updates: 
Season 7 shifts into high gear with all-new gameplay updates for a fresh dose of chaos! Get ready to burn rubber in Mini Mayhem, where you’ll zip around the map battling for first place in an RCXD. And for the first time ever, CODM Battle Royale gets its own Gulag—fight your way back from elimination in a gritty 1v1 showdown on ‘Isolated’. 

From deep-sea secrets to Mythic mayhem, Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7: Phantom Current plunges you into a fresh experience. The current’s pulling you in—so gear up and dive headfirst into the action!

- New Outfits will be available for a limited time on November 7, with last year's trendy costumes returning for a limited period. Don't miss this annual special: unlock a new outfit at a special price!

- Memory System search and sorting functions upgraded—easier, more precise filtering makes your Memories always within reach.

Fortnite.releaseNotes:
Mobile Optimization
We’re continuing our efforts to make it faster and easier to jump into Fortnite!
With v38.00, Blitz Royale is now the only experience included in new installs, letting you get into the action quicker and play your way. You can also play and update creator-made islands without waiting for other experiences to download or update. That way, you can choose when to download experiences like Battle Royale, Creative, Reload, OG, LEGO Fortnite, Rocket Racing or Fortnite Festival - keeping the initial install smaller.

Fortnite | Simpsons
Springfield is the Island in the new Battle Royale Season! Unlock Homer, Marge, and more in the Battle Pass.

Get a Trusty Sidekick
Unlock the first Sidekick in Fortnite, Peels, in the Battle Pass. Sidekicks tag along with you!

Hay Day.releaseNotes:
Hay Day Update 1.67
Hey, farmers! Our latest update is here, packed with new ways to boost your farm, earn rewards, and enjoy the season in style. Here’s what’s new:

- Fresh Beats (Beta): 
We’re introducing a brand-new temporary perk that instantly boosts your crops, animals, or production for a short time. This early preview will be available for beta-testing to some players while we collect feedback and refine it. We’re looking forward to hearing the community's reaction to this feature before the full rollout.

- Tiny Trail: 
We are testing a bite-sized Truck Order Event running for just 4 days, with Diamonds & Coins as the main rewards. Since this is an early test, not everyone will see the event right away. We’ll be working on ways to bring it to more farmers, in the future. 

- Surprise Boxes:
 A more intentional way to get the Decorations. Every box you open increases your chances of getting the reward you're hoping for.

- Seasonal Creatures: 
Limited-time visitors can appear on your farm, friends’ farms, or during special in-game events. Keep your eyes open, and you might see some guests appearing soon...

- Easier Tree & Bush Help Requests: 
We are making it easier to request help for bushes and trees. Drag the help sign across multiple fruit trees and bushes to request help all at once.

- New Animals & Decorations, including Pet Birds: 
Let's welcome to the farm;  Blueberry Muffin, Blueberry Cheesecake, Brown Capybara Pup, Red Capybara Pup, Horse Stable, Scarlet Macaw,  Hyacinth Macaw (Available in October).

- Derby Improvements: Multiple Derby bug fixes & improvements.

7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!
3. New Feature: Mood Status. Set a status to let others know how you're feeling, making social interactions more fun and personal.

Pixel Flow!.releaseNotes: The latest update has landed! Discover new challenges, improved stability, and a more responsive experience all around. We’ve expanded the game with new levels, refined old ones, and made everything run smoother. Your journey just got even better, dive in and explore the upgrades!

Last War:Survival.releaseNotes:
1. Gift level cap increased to Level 25, with new dynamic emotes and Avatar Frame rewards added.
2. Optimized the interface display of Arena [Battle Record] to more clearly show defense and win/loss information.

MONOPOLY GO!.releaseNotes:
A new version has made its way to your Boards, Tycoons!
This time, Mr. M focused on squashing bugs and smoothing out your gameplay experience—all to get things ready for the next Sticker collection!
So update now and GO for the Stickers you need while you can to win A-list rewards!

Imposter - Party Word Game.releaseNotes: New: Optional hint word for the Imposter. Helps them get away - can you still spot them?

Magic Tiles 3: Piano Game.releaseNotes: We regularly update the game to enhance your experience! Don’t forget to update and enjoy the latest improvements. Stay connected with us on TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, and Instagram @magictiles3.

Subway Surfers.releaseNotes:
- The crew is heading to Seoul for a season full of neon lights, K-pop vibes and fun and vibrant energy!
- The Subway Surfers x Among Us event continues: unlock the rest of the Crewmates and find the Impostor in this amazing crossover!
- Run through futuristic streets and unlock the new characters: Si Woo, Joo Won and Lucky’s edgy new Outfit.
- Show off your best moves in our fun Challenges to earn rewards and exclusive content.

Pokémon TCG Pocket.releaseNotes:
● Mega Rising: Mega Gyarados, Mega Rising: Mega Blaziken, and and Mega Rising: Mega Altaria booster packs are now available.
● New share feature.
● More cards eligible for trading.
● Wonder pick feature updated.
● Flair can now be obtained automatically.
● Increased the number of decks you can build.
● Player level max has been increased.
● Improvements to some features.

Royal Kingdom.releaseNotes:
Get ready for a splendid new update!

• Prepare yourself for 100 NEW LEVELS! Experience fun and exciting challenges!

• Explore the new district, AIRPORT! Keep expanding the kingdom to discover new horizons!

Play Royal Kingdom now!

Coin Sort.releaseNotes: Bug Fixes and Optimizations. Thank you for playing Coin Sort!

Geometry Dash Lite.releaseNotes:
- New Level: Geometrical Dominator!
- New Demon Level: Theory of Everything 2!
- Collect Orbs to unlock items in the Shop.
- Play the Daily Level and earn bonuses.
- Weekly Demon and Event Levels now live!
- New unique Levels every week!
- Bonus platformer levels!
- New Achievements and unlocks.
- Daily chests, find secrets, bonuses and more!
- Bugfixes and tweaks.

Triumph: Play for Cash.releaseNotes: Why did the chicken cross the road? To beat its high score, obviously.

Hole.io.releaseNotes:
- Hole Escape is here! Jump into our new limited-time event! Win stages, escape being devoured by the hole and earn big rewards! Who will be the last survivor?
- Bug Fixes

Royal Match.releaseNotes:
Are you ready for a spooky new update?

• Get ready for amazing 100 NEW LEVELS! Hit the CLOCK TOWER and watch the GEARS burst onto the board!

• Explore the NEW AREA! Stock up on scares and sweets in the HALLOWEEN SHOP!

New levels are coming in every two weeks! Be sure to update your game to get the latest content!

Differences - Find & Spot It.releaseNotes:
Hey all players,
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Explore the fun of spotting differences in tons of beautifully designed pictures!
If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us at af@gurugame.ai.
Thanks for choosing us!

Angry Birds 2.releaseNotes: Minor fixes and improvements. Just cleaning up around the nest.

Color Block Jam.releaseNotes: New look, same fun! We’ve refreshed our game icon, so you’ll spot us more easily on your home screen. Get ready to take your skills to the next level with our LATEST NEW OBSTACLE! This update introduces the COLORFUL CRATE and FRESH NEW LEVELS! Colorful crates are cleared once all blocks of the same color are removed from the board. Watch carefully which colors you have, plan your moves wisely, and clear your path with perfect timing! Strategy, timing, and precision will decide your success. Don’t miss the new update!

Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT:Visit the Dark Zone and unlock the Howling Factory! Join Sam, Colton and Harrison as they're transported to a strange nightmare world. Help them escape by collecting points and unlock exclusive decorations to complete the event.

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Descend into uncharted depths with Call of Duty®: Mobile’s Season 7: Phantom Current! Unearth the secrets of the abyss and encounter CODM’s sixth Mythic Operator, Dark Shepherd, a special crossover with Girls’ Frontline, and a refreshed Legendary reward in the Secret Cache system. 

New Mythic Dark Shepherd: 
Unleash darkness with the most sinister Mythic Operator yet, Dark Shepherd – Phantom. Wield the Epic Scythe and Legendary AS-VAL to dominate the lobby with forces from another dimension. With power coursing through your veins, every fight becomes a surge of unstoppable force. 

New Secret Cache Reward: 
Another Legendary weapon skin is landing in the Secret Cache system! Log in and play to start earning the RUS-79U – Mystical Lamp… before it vanishes in a puff of smoke—and no genie can bring it back. 
 
Girls’ Frontline: 
Girls’ Frontline deploys into Call of Duty®: Mobile in Season 7! Recruit an iconic T-Doll Operator and gear up with exclusive themed items. Complete the seasonal event to de-stress, reload, and reinforce your squad with free Girls’ Frontline rewards. 

New Battle Passes:  
Season 7 brings an all-new Battle Pass and the opportunity to earn 50 tiers of free and premium rewards, including the new MG 82 weapon and Bomb Drone Scorestreak! Gear up and stay the course—more treasures await you in the Season 8 Battle Pass! 

New Battle Pass Vaults:    
Fan-favorite Battle Passes are setting sail once again in the Vault for Seasons 7 and 8—don’t miss your chance to rearm with gear from past deployments! Season 7 brings Season 11: Ultimate Frontier (2022) and Season 7: Heat Wave (2023) back on deck. Hold steady—more cargo is charted for arrival in Season 8! 

Major Gameplay Updates: 
Season 7 shifts into high gear with all-new gameplay updates for a fresh dose of chaos! Get ready to burn rubber in Mini Mayhem, where you’ll zip around the map battling for first place in an RCXD. And for the first time ever, CODM Battle Royale gets its own Gulag—fight your way back from elimination in a gritty 1v1 showdown on ‘Isolated’. 

From deep-sea secrets to Mythic mayhem, Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 7: Phantom Current plunges you into a fresh experience. The current’s pulling you in—so gear up and dive headfirst into the action!

Wool Crush -Escape Traffic Jam.releaseNotes: Optimized and adjusted current levels for smoother experience.

Jigblock™ Puzzle.releaseNotes:
Bugs Fix: can play level after finishing daily challenge;
Improve collection process;

MONOPOLY: Bingo!.releaseNotes: Version 1.9 introduces Special Card Packs—including Gold Packs with guaranteed Gold Cards and Master Packs with guaranteed new cards to boost your collection. Enjoy new seasonal board events like Monster Midway and themed rooms including Pie Party, Turkey Time, and Tangled Up. Plus, updated missions, tournaments, and rewards make completing the upcoming card series, Home for the Holidays, faster than ever!

Hexa Away.releaseNotes:
New stage gimmicks added!
Challenge yourself with fresh, never-before-seen puzzle levels!

Clash of Clans.releaseNotes:
Rank Up!
·   Multiplayer split! Join Tournaments and climb new Leagues in Ranked Battles, or duke it out in regular Battles without the risk of losing Trophies.
·   Revenge is back, and it’s sweet! Attack players that raided your Village to get your resources back!
·   Shields have switched up! Introducing Magic Shields that protect resources and Legend Shields that skip upcoming League Days.
·   Other Changes: We’re reworking Spring Traps and removing Town Hall Weapon Levels.

Homescapes.releaseNotes:
Get ready for a thrilling Homescapes update!
 
HALLOWEEN: A NIGHT IN THE WOODS
• Help Robbie find his daughter Chloe in the nighttime forest!
• Uncover the mystery of the sinister masked figure!
• Finish the event to earn a unique decoration!
 
THE FRONTIER'S GOLD
• Learn the story of Austin's great-grandmother, the fearless Marshal Goldy!
• Foil the local bandits' plans and be the first to claim the legendary treasures!
• Finish the event to earn a unique decoration!
 
ALSO
• Spooky Pass and Home Pass! Activate the passes to get coins, boosters, and other valuable rewards!
• The Other Half story continues! Who will Katherine choose?

UNO!™.releaseNotes:
Holiday Spice Collection:
-11.3-12.28: Your sweet escape begins! Also comes with Style Zone update!

UNO Contest:
-10.20: Halloween Limited Ring Royale!
-11.1: Grand Slam returns with Wild Discard All rules!
-10.23-30: limited-time rerun of Grand Slam S3!

Fresh Gameplay:
-11.7: First run of the new limited "No Mercy" mode! Win one match to earn an exclusive emoji.
-Multipliers added to Winner Takes All mode!

Baking Partners:
-11.10-16: Bake up a storm to earn the limited Cookie Gobble Medal!

Friday Night Funkin' Mobile.releaseNotes:
Hey, hope you’re enjoying Funkin’ on the go!

We’ve been hard at work to make the game better for you:

- Optimized performance in Stress (Pico Mix).
- Fixed some visual issues with the Freeplay menu.
- Fixed various issues with the Week 6 dialogue.
- Fixed the Lag Adjustment arrows disappearing when re-entering.
- A bunch more fixes here and there.

Thanks for playing! Have we mentioned we love you lately?

- New Exclusive Character “Entombment of Iniquity - Dante”!

寒霜啟示錄.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Coin Master.releaseNotes:
Thanks for playing Coin Master!

In this version, we’ve implemented bug fixes & performance improvements.

We have also implemented our new reward calendar feature - collect your daily rewards! 

Enjoy a world of fun, thrills, and huge rewards right at your fingertips. 

Invite your friends to play Coin Master & get your FREE REWARDS! We also recommend joining our community on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for more fun & excitement.

糖果傳奇.releaseNotes:
We hope you’re having fun playing Candy Crush Saga! 

We update the game every week with sweet new features, exciting levels, and important bug fixes to keep everything running smoothly. 

Don't forget to download the latest version for the best experience!

New to the game? Don’t be shy, join the fun!

麻將 神來也麻將－台灣16張、麻雀.releaseNotes:
Improved gameplay.

Note:
If you have trouble logging in or forgot your password, please click on "Can't sign in" on the login screen to send a report. We will immediately take care of the issue.

Gamesofa are constantly striving to improve the quality of our games. If you have any suggestions, please let us know using the customer feedback function so we can solve the problem. Thank you!

王國之歌（Top Heroes）.releaseNotes: The Ancient and Frostfield Battlefields usher in a brand-new “Turnaround Moment”! When the final battle drums sound, the tides of war shift—both factions will earn double points. Comeback or domination, everything will be decided in the final moments.

滿貫大亨 - 快打旋風登場.releaseNotes: 《仙境傳說》傳說再起，乘倍一路狂飆！

Pokémon GO.releaseNotes: Trainers, we hope you’re enjoying your adventure in Pokémon GO! We update the app regularly with new events and features, so make sure to check the in-game News to stay up to date.

楓之谷M - 奇幻冒險MMORPG.releaseNotes:

A fall Gardenscapes update!
NEW EVENTS
Legends of Transylvania: find the missing girls and complete a horror quest!

STORYLINE
Find out what Bill Young's parents were secretly working on at their oceanographic station!

Pikmin Bloom.releaseNotes:
Thanks for playing Pikmin Bloom! New in this version:

- Minor improvements and bug fixes.

*Please download the latest version of the app from the store for the changes above to be reflected.

弓箭傳說2.releaseNotes:
1. Lost Kingdom series heroes: Cleo, Phynx, Mymu, and their new Halloween skins "Fiery Reckoning," "Scarlet Sandstorm," and "Empowered Curse."
2. Halloween Special Event: Candy Carnival! Get the new Halloween-themed relics: Frostflame Lamp and Boltfang Candy Jar!
3. Halloween Limited Brawl Mode: Trick-or-Treat Party!
4. Guild Expedition will now be season-based, and the first season is about to officially begin!
5. Optimized Arena Grouping for new servers.

貓咪大戰爭.releaseNotes:
■追加「不死生物來襲」活動的宇宙篇第3章
　※於通過宇宙篇第3章後解放

■調整部分活動的開始條件
　「寶物嘉年華」和「統率力1/2」的活動開始條件，調整為玩家通過「世界篇」第1章的「台灣」後開始舉辦。
　當玩家將遊戲中最棒的寶物都收集完畢後，「寶物嘉年華」活動就會停止出現。
　※活動日程中的「寶物嘉年華」項目也會停止顯示。

■追加貓咪基地所顯示的活動資訊
　畫面會顯示其他頁面的貓咪基地所舉辦中的活動資訊。

■追加角色的進化型態
　追加了部份角色的第4進化

■追加角色本能
　追加了部份角色的本能、超本能

■傳奇故事
　追加新地圖

■其他追加內容
　追加等級排行報酬
　追加貓咪聯組
　改善部分遊戲功能

■修正部分程式錯誤

b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.
